mediaTypes.title: image
mediaTypes.logo: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' class='feather feather-image'><path d='M21 21H3V3h18v18z'></path><path d='M17 13l-4-4-5 5'></path></svg>

staticTypes.title: text
